name: OneDirtyRoom
description:
My first Ludum Dare yeah!
OneDirtyRoom is a classic 2D Shooter. Instead of cleaning the one room, shoot all the big flies!

Used tools:
- Unity3D 5.5
- GIMP 2
- Spriter
- Audacity
- http://www.bfxr.net/
- http://online.boscaceoil.net/

LD37 link: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

Thanks for playing :)

Daniel "xoidberg" Hein
